languages.text: "Н-не могу согреться... Держал ладонь над свечой, а огонь ледяной".
"I just c-can't escape this cold... I've tried holding my hand over a candle, but the fire was like ice."
languages.original_text: "Н-не могу согреться... Держал ладонь над свечой, а огонь ледяной".

traits.locale_text: "I just c-can't escape this cold... I've tried holding a hand over a candle, but the fire was like ice."
"I just c-can't escape this cold... I've tried holding a hand over a candle, but the fire was like ice."
"I just c-can't escape this cold... I've tried holding my hand over a candle, but the fire was like ice."
"I just c-can't escape this cold... I've tried holding my hand over a candle, but the fire was like ice."

"I just c-can't escape this cold... I've tried holding my hand over a candle, but the fire was like ice."

languages.text: "Ich k-kann dieser Kälte nicht entkommen ... Ich hielt meine Hand über eine Kerze, aber ihr Feuer war wie Eis."
languages.original_text: "I just c-can't escape this cold... I've tried holding my hand over a candle, but the fire was like ice."

traits.locale_text: "Ich k-kann dieser Kälte nicht entkommen ... Ich hielt meine Hand über eine Kerze, aber ihr Feuer war wie Eis."

languages.text: « C'est un froid auquel on n'échappe pas... J'ai bien tenté de placer ma main au-dessus d'une bougie, mais sa flamme était de glace. »
languages.original_text: "I just c-can't escape this cold... I've tried holding my hand over a candle, but the fire was like ice."

traits.locale_text: « C'est un froid auquel on n'échappe pas... J'ai bien tenté de placer ma main au-dessus d'une bougie, mais sa flamme était de glace. »

languages.text: «No pu... puedo escapar de este frío... He intentado colocar la mano sobre una vela, pero el fuego me helaba».
languages.original_text: "I just c-can't escape this cold... I've tried holding my hand over a candle, but the fire was like ice."

traits.locale_text: «No pu... puedo escapar de este frío... He intentado colocar la mano sobre una vela, pero el fuego me helaba».

languages.text: 「とにかく、この寒さからは、に、逃れられない…蝋燭に手をかざしてみたけど、火は氷のようだった」
languages.original_text: "I just c-can't escape this cold... I've tried holding my hand over a candle, but the fire was like ice."

traits.locale_text: 「とにかく、この寒さからは、に、逃れられない…蝋燭に手をかざしてみたけど、火は氷のようだった」

languages.text: “我……我不管怎么做都冷得要死……我试过把手放在蜡烛上烤，但火焰就像冰一样冷。”
languages.original_text: "I just c-can't escape this cold... I've tried holding my hand over a candle, but the fire was like ice."

traits.locale_text: “我……我不管怎么做都冷得要死……我试过把手放在蜡烛上烤，但火焰就像冰一样冷。”

languages.text: "Bu... Soğuktan kaçış yok... Elimi mumun üzerinde tutmaya çalıştım ama alevi buz gibiydi."
languages.original_text: "I just c-can't escape this cold... I've tried holding my hand over a candle, but the fire was like ice."
